short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens a new tab in the current group via keyboard shortcut

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple extension that opens a new tab in the current tab group using a shortcut.

Windows: Ctrl+Shift+Y
Mac: Command+Shift+Y
Chrome OS: Ctrl+Shift+U
Linux: Ctrl+Shift+J
